title: Penalty due to unknown DirectX error issue
body:
Dear Riot 

Few hours ago, I could not start a game due to an unknown Direct X error, which resulted me in receiving a penalty for leaving a ranked game. Consequently I have to wait in a lower priority queue, and lost of rank game points. Can you remove the lower priority queue, and restore my rank game point? This was out of my control that caused such problem. 

I fixed Direct X error problem somehow after watching a video clip on Youtube.

I don't know if I have posted on a right board.

replies.body:
It's unfortunate that you had to encounter this error that lead to a DC, however:

> [CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q6)
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.

(The same goes for LP refunds).

On the positive side, you now know what the problem is and how to fix it :)
